title: Doorway Hosting Flow Product Tests
description: BDD product tests validating the visitor to hosted user journey through Doorway
content:
Feature: Doorway Hosting Flow
  As a visitor to Elohim
  I want to access the platform and become a hosted user
  So that I can participate in the community

  @smoke @doorway @navigation
  Scenario: Visitor can access the home page
    Given I am on the home page
    Then the page should load successfully
    And the hero section should be visible
    And the main navigation should be visible

  @smoke @doorway @navigation
  Scenario: Main navigation is functional
    Given I am on the home page
    When I click on "Lamad" in the navigation
    Then I should be on the "/lamad" page
    And the page should load successfully

  @smoke @doorway @api
  Scenario: Doorway API health check
    Given the Doorway API is accessible
    When I request content stats from the API
    Then the response should be successful
    And the content stats should show data exists

  @doorway @workflow
  Scenario: Footer displays build information
    Given I am on the home page
    Then the footer should be present
    And the footer should display the git hash

  @doorway @navigation
  Scenario: Site logo returns to home
    Given I am on the "/lamad" page
    When I click on the site logo
    Then I should be on the home page
